title: 7 B18 Blankets. Low Prices. Stengel, Peckinpaugh
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 7 B18 Blankets. Low Prices. Stengel, Peckinpaugh
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a nice group of B18 blankets priced individually.  In order they are Connolly, Peckinpaugh, Stengel, Tioga Burns, Cole (tax stamp on back), Maisel. Late addition on the second scan is Keating
These all have the 4 brown borders, good centering and color. The Burns has some staining mostly on the back as does Connolly. . . Add 5.00 for shipping regardless of how many you buy. Prices below are net
Connolly $22.00
Peckinpaugh $28.00
Stengel (HOF) 54.99
Burns (Brown Infield) sold
Cole w/ Tax Stamp SOLD
Maisel Sold
Keating $17.00
